select * from (select rownum as rnum, b.* from (select review_board_no, review_board_writer, review_board_title, review_board_category, to_char(review_board_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') as review_board_date, review_board_readCount, review_board_thumbNail, review_board_subContent, like_count from review_board where review_board_status = 1 order by review_board_no desc)b) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select count(*) from review_board where review_board_status = 1
and review_board_title like '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%'
and review_board_writer like '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%'
and review_board_category like '%' || #{searchTerm} || '%'

select * from ( select rownum as rnum, b.* from ( select review_board_no, review_board_writer, review_board_title, review_board_category, to_char(review_board_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as review_board_date, review_board_readCount, review_board_thumbNail, review_board_subContent, like_count from review_board where review_board_status = 1

select max(review_board_no) from review_board
